page.title: 06Other Features
page.content: The{Mushroom Farm}was started 25 years ago and the mushrooms are grown in "houses",which is the name given to the sheds.There are five "houses" in which the mushrooms are grown in rotation, one different "house"being sterilised each time.The mushrooms are grown in large boxes which are sterilised in Formaldehyde Crystals. Conditions must be very sterile as mushrooms are prone to disease.The Compost itself is sterilised for two weeks and then hand_mixed before being put into the boxes. The spawn (seeds) is kept at a temerature of 70_75 degs until it begins to "run", when the temperature is reduced to 60_66 degs.The spawn forms a mould in two weeks and 2 inches of peat is clapped down on top. After a further two weeks the mushrooms are ready for picking.
